title: Define & Translate
description: enter a word to define and get the definition in your language 


# Import Code
```text

```
# Installation
Just Import the code above In Streamer.bot (top left import button) . Copy the Import Code and paste it into the `Import String` field . 
Enable the `??` command.

# Configuration
in the Subaction Field, on the line Set argument `%language%` to, select the language you want to display : available languages are : 
English = en | Français = fr | Deutsch = de | Nederlands = nl | Korean = ko | Ελληνικά = el | Español = es | Português / Brasileiro = pt | Русский = ru | ar = عربعرب
